LFADS.RunParams¶

classLFADS.RunParams[source]¶

Bases: handle

Collection of parameters which are common to all LFADS.Run instances in a LFADS.RunCollection. You must create a subclass of RunParams in which you specify the serialized representation of the parameters that will be used in paths on disk.

Abstract Methods

Abstract[suffix] = generateSuffix()[source]¶

Generates a string representation of the parameters that is used for reading off the parameters from a folder path on disk. You can include as many or as few fields in this serialized representation as you see fit.

Returns:suffix – serialized string suffix suitable for inclusion in file paths
Return type:string

Properties

spikeBinMs = 2[source]¶

Spike bin width in ms

batchSize = 200[source]¶

Number of trials in one mini-batch

regularizerIncreaseSteps = 900[source]¶

Number of steps over which the regularizer costs increase

learningRateDecayFactor = 0.98[source]¶

Decay rate of the learning rate

keepProb = 0.95[source]¶

Dropout of units in the network
